LanguageData.Shell_HighExplosive.label: 81mm mortar shell (HE)
LanguageData.Shell_HighExplosive.description: Low-velocity shell designed to be fired from a mortar.
LanguageData.Shell_Incendiary.label: 81mm mortar shell (Incendiary)
LanguageData.Shell_Incendiary.description: Low-velocity shell designed to be fired from a mortar.
LanguageData.Shell_EMP.label: 81mm mortar shell (EMP)
LanguageData.Shell_EMP.description: Low-velocity shell designed to be fired from a mortar.
LanguageData.Shell_Firefoam.label: 81mm mortar shell (Firefoam)
LanguageData.Shell_Firefoam.description: A pressurized shell filled with fire-extinguishing foam. Can be fired from mortars or installed as a trap. Explodes when damaged.
LanguageData.Shell_Smoke.label: 81mm mortar shell (Smoke)
LanguageData.Shell_Smoke.description: A shell that generates a cloud of smoke when detonated, obscuring incoming shots and preventing turrets from locking on. Can be fired from mortars or installed as a trap. Explodes when damaged.
LanguageData.Shell_AntigrainWarhead.label: 81mm mortar shell (Anti)
LanguageData.Shell_AntigrainWarhead.description: Low-velocity shell designed to be fired from a mortar.
LanguageData.Bullet_81mmMortarShell_HE.label: 81mm mortar shell (HE)
LanguageData.Bullet_81mmMortarShell_Incendiary.label: 81mm mortar shell (Incendiary)
LanguageData.Bullet_81mmMortarShell_EMP.label: 81mm mortar shell (EMP)
LanguageData.Bullet_81mmMortarShell_FireFoam.label: 81mm mortar shell (FireFoam)
LanguageData.Bullet_81mmMortarShell_Smoke.label: 81mm mortar shell (Smoke)
LanguageData.Bullet_81mmMortarShell_Antigrain.label: 81mm mortar shell (Anti)
